item.title: Elderly California jewelry shop owner shoved to floor during brazen smash-and-grab robbery
item.description: An elderly jewelry shop owner in California has been violently attacked during a robbery

item.title: Appeals court upholds Myon Burrell's conviction in gun and drug case
item.description: An appeals court has upheld the conviction of a Minnesota man in a gun and drug case

item.title: Thune says Senate will change the rules to push through Trump's blocked nominees
item.description: Republicans are moving to change the rules of the Senate to approve more of President Donald Trump's nominees

item.title: Republicans are eager for President Trump to expand his use of the military on US soil
item.description: President Donald Trump is swiftly implementing his vision of the military as an all-powerful tool for his policy goals

item.title: Chicago churches urge calm resistance to expected federal intervention
item.description: Churches citywide are turning up their response from the pulpit.
